meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of hives or nettle rash.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the urticarial reaction on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent2: She experienced an urticarial rash after coming in contact with poison ivy.
meanings.sent3: The urticarial appearance of the hives made the patient scratch uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The urticarial nature of the rash was like tiny red flags waving on her skin.
meanings.sent5: The urticarial welts glowed angrily on his arms, demanding attention.

meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by the formation of hives or welts.
meanings.sent1: The child's urticarial caused discomfort and itching.
meanings.sent2: She applied cream to soothe the urticarial on her legs.
meanings.sent3: The urticarial on his back looked like a map of red islands.
meanings.sent4: The urticarial welts seemed to dance on her skin like tiny creatures.
meanings.sent5: The urticarial hives covered her body like a prickly blanket.
